activities: SAFE-BioPharma Association acts as a processor on behalf of its members [in the biopharmaceutical sector] providing services including processing data in connection with digital certificates used for identity verification.  In this capacity, SAFE-BioPharma does not own or have independent rights to control the use of the personal data it processes on behalf of its clients; it acts solely on the instructions of its customers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: off-line, on-line, manually processed data, human resources information
